name: Poached Mediterranean Salmon
author: gmv1219
summary: Home-made recipe using the flavors of olives, tomatoes, basil, and capers to add flavor to a simple and healthier poached salmon.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 pound) salmon fillet, skin removed and quartered
directions: Combine lemon juice, capers, olives, vinegar, garlic, and enough water to cover the salmon in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Bring to a boil and add salmon
Let simmer, covered, until salmon is opaque and easily flaked with a fork, about 10 minutes
Let liquid simmer until reduced by half, about 5 minutes
Add tomatoes and basil; cook and stir the sauce until tomatoes begin to break down, about 3 minutes
Spoon sauce over the salmon to serve
